DOC.brief_summary: The aim observational study : produce complete dental prosthesis aid CAD-CAM ( Computer aid design & manufacturing ) - 3D printing ( Stereolithography ) technology - use printable material Poli ( methylmetacrylate ) - PMMA - Nano TiO2 nanoparticles composite completely characterize .
DOC.detailed_description: In order improve complete denture fabrication experimental model optimize composite material execution technique 3D print dental prosthesis develop . - A new polymer - nano-TiO2 composite system dentures print obtain add 0,4-1 % TiO2 nanoparticle commercially available E-Dent 100 ( EnvisionTEC , Germany ) . - The new polymer completely characterized biocompatibility test perform . - A stereolithography technique set-up CAD-CAM complete denture manufacture . - 3D printed dental prosthesis insert number 35 complete edentulous patient target group ; - Clinical follow-up 6 , 12 18 month quality assessment denture record specific chart . - A statistical evaluation data record entire follow-up period perform .
DOC.criteria: Patients require mobile removable denture establish diagnosis treatment plan , follow initial clinical laboratory examination , Persons mental competence , decisionmaking capacity , legal competence . Patients willing accept complete denture treatment . Patients good systemic health , able attend followup session . Patients accept participation study , include 18 month followup sign consent form . Patients agree CADCAM technique denture manufacturing . Patients refuse participation study sign consent form . Patients willing removable dental restoration . Patients willing participate 18 month followup evaluation .
